parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The ID of the portable account. The ID must be a 16-digit string. The string can contain digits and lowercase letters.

parameters.name: OwnerAccessInheritable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to share the directory. Valid values:

*   false (default): does not share the directory.
*   true: shares the directory.

> *   This parameter takes effect only if the Type parameter is set to Directory and the Owner parameter is not empty.
> *   The permissions on a directory can be inherited by the owner. The owner has read and write permissions on the subdirectories and subfiles created in the directory, even if they are created by others.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The absolute path of the directory or file. The path must start and end with a forward slash (/) and must be 2 to 1024 characters in length.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the object. Valid values:

*   File
*   Directory
